<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[One For All](/Feats.aspx?ID=6133) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=541" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=590" />
<trait label="Linguistic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=642" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 164 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39)

</column>

---

With precisely the right words of encouragement, you bolster an ally's efforts. Designate an ally within 30 feet; this action counts as sufficient preparation to [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=2292) that ally. When you use the Aid reaction to help that ally, you can roll [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) in place of the usual check and the action gains the [bravado](/Traits.aspx?ID=801) trait.
name: One For All
